name: Super Archer Man 2
description:
The long awaited sequel to Super Archer Man

Fight away the enemies and get to the crown.

Controls:
F - Deploy Bird / Pick back up bird
1-4 - Switch Bow
WASD - Control Character
Arrow Keys - Control Bird

Creators:
Allan Legemaate
Danny Van Stemp
Sullivan Stobo

Created with HaxeFlixel
